data.message: Implement workspace guard (Layer 2 security): Created workspace_guard.py with: path scoping to DURO_WORKSPACE, path traversal detection (.., symlinks, unicode confusables), high-risk path patterns requiring approval (.env, credentials, .ssh), bash command path extraction. Integrated into policy gate - workspace check runs after autonomy approval. Default workspace is ~/.agent. Added tools: duro_workspace_status, duro_workspace_add, duro_workspace_validate. All tests passing, pushed to security/policy-gate-exec-path branch.
